7/* Scipy changes:
8 * - 06-22-2016: Removed all code not related to double precision and
9 * ported to c for use in Cephes
10 */
11
12#include "mconf.h"
13#include "lanczos.h"
14
15
16static double lanczos_sum(double x)
17{
18 return ratevl(x, num: lanczos_num,
19 M: sizeof(lanczos_num) / sizeof(lanczos_num[0]) - 1,
20 denom: lanczos_denom,
21 N: sizeof(lanczos_denom) / sizeof(lanczos_denom[0]) - 1);
22}
23
24
25double lanczos_sum_expg_scaled(double x)
26{
27 return ratevl(x, num: lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_num,
28 M: sizeof(lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_num) / sizeof(lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_num[0]) - 1,
29 denom: lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_denom,
30 N: sizeof(lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_denom) / sizeof(lanczos_sum_expg_scaled_denom[0]) - 1);
31}
32
33
34static double lanczos_sum_near_1(double dx)
35{
36 double result = 0;
37 unsigned k;
38
39 for (k = 1; k <= sizeof(lanczos_sum_near_1_d)/sizeof(lanczos_sum_near_1_d[0]); ++k) {
40 result += (-lanczos_sum_near_1_d[k-1]*dx)/(k*dx + k*k);
41 }
42 return result;
43}
44
45
46static double lanczos_sum_near_2(double dx)
47{
48 double result = 0;
49 double x = dx + 2;
50 unsigned k;
51
52 for(k = 1; k <= sizeof(lanczos_sum_near_2_d)/sizeof(lanczos_sum_near_2_d[0]); ++k) {
53 result += (-lanczos_sum_near_2_d[k-1]*dx)/(x + k*x + k*k - 1);
54 }
55 return result;
56}
